author: Sean Irvine
title: A new monument to the fallen takes shape in London
text:
[Skip to main content](#main)
A new monument to the fallen takes shape in London
London City Council will be asked to approve the creation of a new memorial for Canada’s fallen next week.
The Byron Legion Monument will be built in the heart of Springbank Park.
Former London Mayor Ed Holder is among those backing the project.
“What better place than Springbank Park?” he told CTV News London during an interview at the proposed site.
The monument will be placed in a roundabout next to a prominent walking trail
Joining Holder Thursday was Reverend Frank Mantz. Since 2007, he’s been trying to create a new location for Byron’s annual Remembrance Day service.
At present, it takes place in front of the Bryon Royal Canadian Legion Branch on Commissioners Road.
Mantz says moving to a new location in Springbank Park will offer improved safety and new ways to remember.
“That is our hope, that people get more into Remembrance Day. The more they put into the day, the more they’re going to get out of it.”
The completed monument will feature military members and peacekeepers in a circular design.
An artist rendering of the proposed monument for Springbank Park.
“So that when you walk around and see all these figures, it will actually look like they’re moving,” Mantz explained.
Holder said placards with QR codes will be set up around the monument to enhance visitor understanding.
“And to learn a story about the wars and the peacekeeping roles. We think that is important.”
Holder, who lost an uncle to combat in World War II, said the project is personal for him.
Construction costs for the monument are anticipated to reach $400,000 with $150,000 already raised, the rest coming from the community.
Fundraising efforts include online donations and potentially, boxes inside local businesses.
“So that people can drop a loonie or toonie in and help us remember,” explained Holder.
And remembering is what it is all about for Mantz.
“We need the whole community to be part of this and to feel part of this. Feel part of what the veterans have done and give thanks for their service.”
The monument is to be complete for Remembrance Day services in 2025.
London Top Stories
CTVNews.ca Top Stories
'How can we make Nunavut better?' Premier full of hope as deal with Ottawa is signed
P. J. Akeeagok and Prime Minister Justin Trudeau finalized on Thursday what is formally called the 'Nunavut Lands and Resources Devolution Agreement.' The agreement transfers powers over public lands, waters and the non-renewable resources each contain to the territory and away from the federal government.
Man, 22, charged in connection with largest wildfire in N.S. history
Nova Scotia’s Natural Resources Department says a 22-year-old man has been charged in connection with a massive wildfire in Shelburne County last spring.
As few as 20 per cent of Canadians remain mostly working from home: latest data
The percentage of Canadians working most of their hours from home has shrunk over time, dropping to roughly 20 per cent in November 2023, according to a new report from Statistics Canada.

Canada's Competition Bureau is warning businesses not use reviews posted by their employees without proper disclosure, or they could be subject to penalties under the Competition Act.
Children's pain and fever medicine recalled due to acetaminophen overdose risk
Drugmaker Teva Canada Ltd. is recalling one lot of its Pediatrix Acetaminophen Oral Solution after product testing found the children's liquid pain medicine contains too much acetaminophen, posing an overdose risk.
Melania Trump remembers her mother as 'a ray of light in the darkest days'
Former First Lady Melania Trump on Thursday remembered her mother as 'a ray of light in the darkest of days' during a funeral service at a church not far from the family's Mar-a-Lago estate.
Arnold Schwarzenegger held at Munich airport after failing to declare expensive watch
Arnold Schwarzenegger will face criminal tax proceedings after failing to declare an item upon arrival to Germany, a Munich Customs press officer told CNN Wednesday.
Columnist accusing Trump of sex assault faces cross-examination in a New York courtroom
With former U.S. President Donald Trump no longer in the courtroom Thursday, a columnist who accused him of sexually attacking her concluded her testimony with an emphatic denial that she had benefited from the publicity that followed the allegations.

A University of Waterloo scientist has helped solve a longstanding mathematical problem deemed impossible for more than 60 years.

author: L_105078
title: 厦门翔安：集中整治出实招 作风转变暖民心
text:
2025年07月22日15:55 | 来源： 厦门日报 小字号
原标题：集中整治出实招 作风转变暖民心 　　组织“一号难求”的名医深入基层，让群众在家门口就能享受优质医疗服务；为部分党员群众免费体检，暖心护航党员群众健康；创新“社会救助流动驿站”模式，覆盖全区128个村（社区），惠及困难群众2924人次；面对农产品滞销，多方联动助农销售约100万公斤包菜……
　　自深入贯彻中央八项规定精神学习教育开展以来，翔安区各部门将学习教育与解决实际问题紧密结合，聚焦主题学、紧扣问题查、深入抓整改，从实际出发真抓实干、立查立改、即知即改，在解决群众急难愁盼问题中改进作风，让群众切实感受到学习教育带来的新变化、新成效。
　　学用结合 精准施策解民忧
　　翔安区各部门坚持以学促干、学用结合，将学习教育成果转化为为民服务的实事、好事。6月29日，翔安区委组织部联合南普陀寺慈善会、区卫健局、金海街道等单位组织16位省级名中医与台湾中医专家代表组成的义诊团队，将“党建引领惠民生·义诊服务进社区”办到欧厝社区居民家门口。平日“一号难求”的专家们吸引了众多慕名而来的居民，不仅如此，翔安区委组织部、金海街道和医护人员组成的党员先锋义诊小队深入社区开展“红色暖心行动”，为年老体弱、行动不便的老党员提供上门诊疗服务，把党的关怀送到家里。此次义诊惠及了近800名市民，其中包括10位在厦台胞，有力推动优质医疗资源下沉社区，促进学习教育成果在“为民办实事”中落地见效，也进一步拓展和丰富了城中村现代化治理的内涵和成效。
为特殊人群提供上门诊疗服务。翔安区委宣传部供图
　　此外，翔安区聚焦解决群众可感可及的民生问题，创新推出“社会救助流动驿站”进村（社区）模式，实施现场办公“一站通办”，入户定向摸排困难群众454户次，直接受理符合条件的救助申请528户次，让困难群众在家门口就能享受到便捷的救助服务。同时，组建“持证社工”、“爱心父母”等帮帮团，提供家政、家电维修等志愿服务，结对服务困难群众超3800人次。建立“爱心资源仓库”，发动社会爱心群体、爱心人士向困难群众提供爱心物品、帮扶资金、就业岗位，已累计提供转介服务1187人次，提供爱心物资价值132.71万元。学习教育开展以来，驿站已覆盖全区128个村（社区），惠及困难群众2924人次，有力推动学习教育成果转化为造福百姓的生动实践。
　　聚焦群众 成果转化惠民生
　　翔安区各部门坚持“学查改”贯通发力，将作风效能转化为民生温度，用“担当指数”换取群众“幸福指数”。翔安区委组织部、区卫健局建立“我为群众办实事”实践活动长效机制，为辖区198名生活困难党员、流动党员进行免费健康体检；组织开展“红心护航·翔爱医心——肿瘤早筛公益行”暨翔安肿瘤防治公益联盟党群共建活动，为1600余名群众免费肿瘤筛查，让群众切实感受到优质医疗服务“零距离”。
　　翔安区人社局聚焦守护百姓“养老钱”和“保命钱”，多措并举筑牢社保基金“安全网”，推动为民服务走深走实。通过开展“深化以案促防、维护基金安全”警示教育月活动，对重点岗位开展“一对一”谈心谈话，拧紧思想阀门。深入开展“社保政策进基层”活动，发放宣传资料、现场解读政策，形成群防群治格局。同时，严格执行养老超期未认证人员信息比对工作流程相关制度，防止基金“跑、冒、滴、漏”。每月按10%随机抽查业务档案，对疑点数据及时排查、逐一整改；完善“人防+技防”监督体系，提升风险防控精准度与效率。在追缴基金时，充分发挥联动协同优势，对于跨地区异地追缴，由单位领导带队推进，有力为社保基金安全护航。
翔安区多措并举，让“滞销菜”变成“暖心菜”。翔安区委宣传部供图
　　面对新圩镇农户包菜滞销的困境，翔安区农业农村和水利局第一时间成立工作专班，全面摸排滞销包菜情况及农户具体诉求，建立详细产销台账，为精准施策提供数据支撑。主动对接厦门元初食品股份有限公司、厦门夏商集团有限公司等21家企业，搭建“基地直采+电商直销”平台，推动直采直销、集采集配模式，减少中间环节损耗。联合多部门发起政府内部采购倡议，发动各级党政机关、事业单位食堂带头采购。同时，向社会发起倡议，倡导“以购代捐”与“以买代帮”，发动民营企业、学校、医院等集体单位参与采购。这一系列纾困解难的举措累计帮助菜农销售包菜约100万公斤，为农户挽回损失近百万元，让“滞销菜”变成了“暖心菜”。
　　下一步，翔安区将坚持以人民为中心，锲而不舍落实中央八项规定精神，驰而不息推进作风建设，推动集中整治工作向纵深发力，确保学有质量、查有力度、改有成效，以作风建设新成效做好服务民生“大文章”，不断将学习教育成果转化为民生福祉。（记者 曾嫣艳 通讯员 王晖强 戴铭洋）
(责编：陈遴、刘卿) 分享让更多人看到

author: , York Daily Record
title: Watch comedian D.L. Hughley's DNC speech attacking Trump
text: Actor D.L. Hughley spoke at the final night of the Democratic National Convention to criticize GOP nominee Donald Trump 's comment that he didn't realize was Vice President Kamala Harris a Black woman. "I guarantee you Kamala has been Black, a lot longer than Trump's been a Republican," Hugley said. The stand-up comedian added that he never thought he would be supporting a prosecutor and a teacher and regretted assumptions he's made about her record. Hughley said he believes an apology should be louder than an accusation saying "I'm here apologizing to the whole damn world." DNC Day 4: Live coverage of speaker schedule, Kamala Harris to take the stage Watch D.L. Hughley's full DNC convention speech What to know about D.L. Hughley - Who he is: Darryl Lynn Hughley is an actor and stand-up comedian from Los Angeles. He is best known for his role in 2000 comedy "The Original Kings of Comedy" and for being the first host of BET's ComicView. In 2019 he hosted his own talk show "The DL Hughley Show." - What role he plays: Hughley, a speaker on the final night of the Democratic National Convention, said he regrets some of his prior views on Harris' leadership. - Key quote: "Kamala is getting broad support. They got Black men for Kamala, white men for Kamala, Latinos and Asians for Kamala. They even have Republicans for Kamala." When and where is the DNC The Democratic National Convention will take place from August 19-22 in Chicago, Illinois. The United Center, home of the Chicago Bulls and Blackhawks, will be the main venue for the DNC. Chicago has hosted the Democratic Convention 11 times, most recently in 1996 when the United Center saw President Bill Clinton was nominated for a second time. Sign-up for Your Vote: Text with the USA TODAY elections team. How to watch and stream the 2024 DNC The convention will air live on its website , from the United Center in Chicago between 6:15 p.m. and 11 p.m. Eastern (5:15 p.m. to 10 p.m Central) on Monday, and 7 p.m to 11 p.m. Eastern (6 p.m. to 10 p.m. Central) the other days. USA TODAY will provide livestream coverage on YouTube each night of the DNC, Monday through Thursday. What are the themes for each night of the DNC? The DNC announced nightly themes for the convention. The title of the convention is "For the People, For Our Future." Here are the themes for each night: - Monday: "For the People" - Tuesday: "A Bold Vision for America's Future" - Wednesday: "A Fight for our Freedoms" - Thursday: "For our Future"

author: Izaro Díaz
title: “Mi sueño es inspirar a todas las mujeres a través de mis canciones”
text: Joy Ogbeide es otra de tantas mujeres nigerianas que viajaron a Europa para ayudar a que su familia saliera de la precariedad. Estaba a punto de entrar en la universidad cuando su madre le pidió que viajara a España para ayudar a sus hermanos. Su padre había muerto y apenas tenían recursos. “Pensé que Europa iba a ser un lugar excepcional y resultó ser todo lo contrario. Las leyes no me permitían obtener un permiso de residencia y no conocía el idioma. Y no tenía tiempo para estudiar porque mi madre quería que trabajara”, asegura. Muchas personas le presionaron para que entrara en el negocio de la prostitución. Joy se negó rotundamente: “Me supliqué y me dije a mí misma ‘no lo hagas’, pero, cuando me mudé a Barcelona con un familiar, me echaron de casa por no acostarme con un amigo suyo a cambio de dinero. Me ofrecían la prostitución como única salida”, confiesa. El tiempo hizo que Joy se sintiera como el resto de las víctimas (de trata aunque no ejerciera la prostitución) pero llegó un momento en el que tuvo el arrojo suficiente para decidir escapar. Comenzó un negocio de trenzas y, de hecho, según cuenta, “muchas de mis clientas eran otras mujeres que estaban siendo prostituidas y me contaron la crudeza de sus historias”. En ese momento, comprendió que “nunca me dejaría prostituir”. Desde hace un tiempo es una de las agentes de cambio de Acción Contra la Trata: “Queremos reflejar la discriminación que sufrimos las mujeres y nuestra lucha. Damos voz y valentía a muchas de las víctimas que están padeciendo este proceso”, asevera. A pesar de la seguridad que Joy manifiesta, en ocasiones contar su experiencia se convierte en una tarea ardua a la que se debe enfrentar por sororidad hacia sus compañeras: “Cuando hablo se me remueve todo. Estoy abriendo una herida de un momento en el que el pánico protagonizaba mi vida. De vez en cuando vuelve, aunque pensaba que ya lo había superado”. Sin embargo, ella considera que contar su historia “merece la pena porque es una forma de sensibilización para que se entienda que la violencia hacia la mujer con fines de explotación sexual es algo tan real que nos afecta directamente a todas las mujeres. No solo porque nos puede pasar a cualquiera, que también, sino porque además el cómo tratan a otras mujeres es algo que nos afecta a todas las mujeres. Todas somos vistas como objeto de consumo”, expone. Además de ser agente de cambio. Joy es también mediadora de la asociación, trabajo que, por un lado, le ha facilitado el acceso a la comunicación con otras mujeres y, por otro lado, le ha ofrecido un espacio seguro donde poder dedicarse a una de sus pasiones: cantar: “Mi sueño es inspirar a todas las mujeres a través de mis canciones”. El Foro Navarro Contra la Trata atendió en 2022 el año pasado a 118 mujeres como víctimas de trata con fines de explotación sexual, según los indicadores de los diferentes colectivos e instituciones. Acción contra la Trata ha registrado solo este año 20 nuevas atenciones. “Tengo en mi mano la posibilidad de contar a todas estas mujeres mi vida, ahora, como superviviente. Todo el proceso de transformación que he hecho y todo el que me queda hasta sanar del todo. Estoy feliz por poder ser esa voz”, concluye. La voz de Joy Ogbeide clama de forma clara y fuerte para demostrar que después de la trata hay otra vida. Y una mano tendida.

author: NA
title: Football: Soccer-Bayer Leverkusen earn convincing Champions League win over Feyenoord | The Star
text: ROTTERDAM, Netherlands (Reuters) -Germany’s 'Invincibles' Bayer Leverkusen opened their Champions League campaign with a resounding 4-0 away win over Feyenoord on Thursday, after running riot in the first half.

author: Rob Polansky
title: ‘Not all patients are humans’: 14 puppies rescued from rollover vehicle crash
text: WOODSTOCK, CT ( WFSB /Gray News) - Fourteen puppies were rescued from a rollover crash that closed a road in Woodstock, Connecticut Thursday morning. Several fire agencies responded to Senexet Road between Laurel and Bull Hill roads for a single-vehicle rollover accident involving wires down. Firefighters found a pole that had snapped, with wires down, and called Eversource CT to disable the power. Power was out in the area while the electricians worked. Officials say minor injuries were originally reported, but no one ended up being hurt. First responders also rescued and provided care for 14 puppies at the scene. the Muddy Brook Fire Department shared photos on Facebook of firefighters interacting with the puppies. The Necogg Humane Society and a doctor from Peake Brook Veterinary Center responded to the scene to provide veterinary care and shelter to the animals, firefighters said. Some puppies will be taken to a veterinary office for further care. Drivers were warned to expect a “long duration road closure.” Copyright 2024 WFSB via Gray Media Group, Inc. All rights reserved.

author: Wetterauer Zeitung
title: Veronica Ferres in der Kritik: Jetzt reagiert die Schauspielerin
text:
Veronica Ferres in der Kritik: Jetzt reagiert die Schauspielerin
Ihre Botschaften zu Wertschätzung und Feminismus gingen nach hinten los – jetzt steht Veronica Ferres massiv in der Kritik. Ihre Reaktion spaltet die Meinungen.
München – Die Schauspielerin Veronica Ferres (60) sieht sich mit ungewöhnlichen Vorwürfen konfrontiert. Eine bekannte Autorin beschuldigt sie im Netz, Content-Klau begangen zu haben. Jetzt meldet sich die „Das Superweib“-Darstellerin zu Wort und zeigt Reue.
Autorin Tara-Louise Wittwer erhebt schwere Vorwürfe gegen Veronica Ferres
Am 12. Juli veröffentlichte Veronica Ferres ein Instagram-Video, das ein wichtiges gesellschaftliches Thema behandelt. Darin sprach sie über ungleiche Anforderungen an Männer und Frauen mit dem prägnanten Satz: „Ein guter Mann ist immer noch eine durchschnittliche Frau.“ Was als feministisches Statement gedacht war, wurde ihr jedoch schnell zum Verhängnis. Tara-Louise Wittwer (34), bekannt als „Spiegel“-Kolumnistin und spezialisiert auf feministische Themen, erkannte in Ferres‘ Video Ähnlichkeiten zu ihrem eigenen Content.
Bereits Ende Juni hatte Wittwer ein nahezu identisches Video veröffentlicht. Ihre Reaktion ließ nicht lange auf sich warten: „Äh? Könntest du bitte nicht mein Video klauen?“, kommentierte sie direkt unter Ferres‘ Post. „Das macht man einfach nicht, dass man performativ Videos klaut“, so die Kolumnistin in einem weiteren Beitrag auf ihrem Profil. Die Kritik blieb nicht unbemerkt. „Das Video wäre cool, wenn Tara-Louise tatsächlich auch ihre Credits bekommt“, schrieb auch eine Nutzerin stellvertretend für viele enttäuschte Follower.
Veronica Ferres räumt Fehler ein
Kurz darauf reagierte Veronica Ferres schließlich auf die Vorwürfe. In ihrer Instagram-Story verwies sie plötzlich auf Tara-Louise Wittwer: „Auch gesehen bei der großartigen Tara-Louise.” Wenige Stunden später folgte eine weitere ausführliche Entschuldigung der Schauspielerin. „Hier ist ein Fehler passiert, für den ich die Verantwortung trage. Deinen Ärger, liebe Tara-Louise Wittwer, verstehe ich und du hast recht, das zu benennen“, erklärte die 60-Jährige in einem Statement. Sie gab zu, lediglich das ursprüngliche TikTok-Video der Influencerin Jessie Song als Quelle genannt und dabei Wittwers „klare Worte“ übernommen zu haben.
Konsequenterweise löschte Veronica Ferres ihr umstrittenes Video. „Den Credit an dich habe ich nun nachgeholt, aber natürlich viel zu spät. Deswegen habe ich entschieden, das Video zu löschen“, betonte sie. Abschließend würdigte sie die Arbeit der Autorin: „Liebe Tara, bitte entschuldige! Dein Content ist stark, wichtig und inspiriert Frauen, laut zu werden. Bitte mach weiter so.“
Apropos: Veronica Ferres spricht über mögliche Filmprojekte mit ihrer Tochter. Doch die Pläne scheinen komplizierter als gedacht zu sein. Verwendete Quellen: Instagram/veronicaferres, Instagram/wastarasagt
topics: Arts, Culture and Entertainment->arts and entertainment

author: Data Driver
title: Stock Analysis | Crown Castle Outlook - A Challenging Path Ahead
text:
Stock Analysis | Crown Castle Outlook - A Challenging Path Ahead
- Crown Castle (CCI) falls 3.11% with bearish technical indicators and weak chart trends.
- Mixed analyst ratings (3.82 avg) and divergent institutional/retail flows highlight market uncertainty.
- Bearish signals include WR Oversold, Bearish Engulfing, and negative institutional money flows.
- REIT sector lawsuits and S-REIT cash-backed yield shifts could impact CCI's fundamentals and investor sentiment.
Market Snapshot
Crown Castle (CCI) is currently in a downward price trend (-3.11%), with technical indicators strongly bearish. Investors should approach with caution as the chart signals a weak trend and the overall market sentiment is mixed with a simple average rating of 3.82 and a performance-weighted rating of 2.52.
News Highlights
Recent news includes a lawsuit against Broadmark Realty Capital for misleading merger proxy materials, which highlights potential risks for investors in real estate investment trusts (REITs). Additionally, S-REITs are transitioning to more cash-backed yields, aiming for 5.5% in FY 2025. This shift might affect REIT investments, including those in Crown Castle, as managers focus on sustainable distribution models.
Analyst Views & Fundamentals
The average rating score from analysts stands at 3.82, while the weighted rating score is 2.52. Analyst views are dispersed, with a mix of "Neutral," "Strong Buy," and "Buy" ratings. These scores are largely aligned with the current price trend, which is negative.
- PE ratio is 119.65 with an internal diagnostic score of 3.00 (on a 0-10 scale).
- GMAR is 0.74 with a score of 3.00.
- Shareholders’ equity attributable to parent company / Total liabilities is -4.19% with a score of 1.00.
- Gross profit margin is 74.26% with a score of 1.00.
Money-Flow Trends
Big-money flows are predominantly negative, with large and extra-large institutional flows showing negative trends. However, retail and small investor flows are positive, with the small inflow ratio at 51.50% and the medium inflow ratio at 50.43%. This suggests a divide in market sentiment between institutional and retail investors.
Key Technical Signals
The technical analysis for Crown Castle is weak, with an internal diagnostic score of 1.31 and 3 bearish indicators outweighing 0 bullish ones. Key signals include:
- WR Oversold with a score of 1.92 and a win rate of 44.07%.
- Dividend Announcement Date with a score of 1.00 and a win rate of 25.0%.
- Bearish Engulfing with a score of 1.00 and a win rate of 0.0%.
Recent chart patterns from August 5-12 highlight repeated WR Oversold signals and one Bearish Engulfing pattern, indicating negative momentum. The overall trend is clearly bearish, suggesting an avoidance strategy for short-term traders.
Conclusion
With a weak technical outlook, mixed analyst ratings, and divergent money flows, the actionable takeaway is to consider waiting for a potential pull-back before entering a position in Crown Castle. Investors should monitor the impact of recent lawsuits in the REIT sector and track the transition of S-REITs to cash-backed yields, which could affect the company's fundamentals and investor sentiment.
